fulltext:
Business/Marketing 
Lotomo.vn  Mracc.com 
NOV 2018 – Present 
Marketing Manager 
• Assist management in developing the strategic and annual 
LHH integrated marketing plan. Implement the plan and 
monitor & report on its effectiveness 
• Manage the allocated marketing budget 
• Identify new ways of elevating the brand of LHH in Vietnam  
• Plan, implement and monitor campaigns on social media, PPC, 
and email 
• Work closely with sales team optimize their boarding drip 
email sequences, follow up sequences, and long-term touch 
campaigns 
• Manage the design and production of marketing materials, 
including leaflets, posters, flyers, personal emails and e-
newsletters, and Facebook and LinkedIn ads 
• Identify opportunities for sponsorship as well as organizing 
events to promote the LHH brand 
• Produce detailed proposals for events (i.e. timelines, venues, 
staffing and budgets, etc.) 
• Coordinate, troubleshoot and manage events from planning 
phase to post-event evaluation 
• Manage and maintain marketing related CRM system and 
mailing lists 
• Measure and report performance of all digital marketing 
campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs) 
• Plan and execute all digital marketing, including SEO/SEM, 
marketing database, email, social media and display 
advertising campaigns 
Marketing Manager 
JUL 2018 – NOV 2018 
• Develop content of official fan page and website design 
• In charge of posting information and photos on the official 
website and other online media. 
• Plan Digital Marketing project (Facebook ads, Zalo ads, 
Google Adwords, Google Display Network) 
• Take part in planning and organizing of communication, 
marketing, PR and promoting events 
• Be a team leader of student admission and student service 
• Keep track of number of enrollment and adjust recruitment 
plan accordingly 
• Recruit and training sale staff 
NOV 2017 – FEB 2018 
Sale and Marketing Manager 
•
Prepare an annual Business and Marketing Communication 
Plan and review it quarterly to ensure target and purchase 
achievement 
•
Keep track of daily sales and adjust sale plan accordingly 
•
Conduct Visual merchandising and allocate merchandising aids 
•
Maintain and monitor the inventory of POSM 
•
Conduct sales promotion events regularly 
•
Develop content of official fan page and prints 
•
Take part in planning and organizing of communication, 
marketing, PR and promoting events of the hospital 
JUL 2017 – NOV 2017 
Pôle Universitaire Français – HCM Ville 
Vietnam National Univsersity 
Digital Marketing Manager 
•
Develop content of University’s official fan page 
•
In charge of posting university’s information and photos on 
the official website and other online media 
•
Take part in planning and organizing of communication, 
marketing, PR and promoting events of the university’s brand 
name 
•
Take part in planning and organizing university’s events 
(seminar, conference…), in promoting campaign of the 
university’s brand name 
•
Be a team leader of student admission and student service 
 APR 2014 – JUL 2017 
MR LOTOMO Co. Ltd 
Marketing and Product Manager 
VNG Corporation 
Marketing Executive

educations.school: HCMC International University - Vietnam National University

experiences.detail:
• Assist management in developing the strategic and annual
LHH integrated marketing plan. Implement the plan and monitor & report on its effectiveness
• Manage the allocated marketing budget
• Identify new ways of elevating the brand of LHH in Vietnam • Plan, implement and monitor campaigns on social media, PPC, and email
• Work closely with sales team optimize their boarding drip email sequences, follow up sequences, and long-term touch campaigns
• Manage the design and production of marketing materials, including leaflets, posters, flyers, personal emails and e- newsletters, and Facebook and LinkedIn ads
• Identify opportunities for sponsorship as well as organizing events to promote the LHH brand
• Produce detailed proposals for events (i.e. timelines, venues, staffing and budgets, etc.)
• Coordinate, troubleshoot and manage events from planning phase to post-event evaluation
• Manage and maintain marketing related CRM system and mailing lists
• Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs) • Plan and execute all digital marketing, including SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and display advertising campaigns

• Prepare an annual Business and Marketing Communication Plan and review it quarterly to ensure target and purchase achievement
• Keep track of daily sales and adjust sale plan accordingly
• Conduct Visual merchandising and allocate merchandising aids
• Maintain and monitor the inventory of POSM • Conduct sales promotion events regularly
• Develop content of official fan page and prints
• Take part in planning and organizing of communication, marketing, PR and promoting events of the hospital

• Develop content of University’s official fan page
• In charge of posting university’s information and photos on the official website and other online media
• Take part in planning and organizing of communication, marketing, PR and promoting events of the university’s brand name
• Take part in planning and organizing university’s events (seminar, conference...), in promoting campaign of the university’s brand name
